data.author: Chris Poole

changelog.release_notes:
-Fixed weather issues

Sorry for the delay everyone! My midterms really swamped me this semester!
As always, email me with any bugs or suggestions for current or new apps
Added option for vibrate on bluetooth disconnect (2 pulses)
Now supports Aplite! (stay tuned for the ability to invert the colors) Bug fixes include: Temperature over 100 units no longer overlaps with the date. Other minor tweaks and fixes.
Fixes weather not updating when sleep mode finishes, as well as other small fixes.

Included in V1.4:
• Added sleep hours! You can now select a time frame so the watch will not vibrate hourly and the weather fetching is stopped.
• Bug fixes for weather fetching (stay tuned for a better weather provider)
• Graphical bug fixes (date, fonts, etc.)
• Added option to disable battery meter

Updated in V1.2:
- Added color customization - background and font color can be chosen from any of the 64 colors on Pebble Time
- Added battery meter in center of watchface
- Manual location based on latitude/longitude
- Bug fixes (weather 'load' problem)
- Last fetched temperature is now stored in memory - if the temperature is newly fetched, it is shown in bold face
- Graphical tweaks

1. Block Time is now configurable! Choose between Celsius and Fahrenheit, pick a static weather location, and turn on/off hourly vibrate. Keep on the look out for more configuration options coming soon. 

2. Bluetooth status now shown in the center of the screen. Blue square represents an active bluetooth connection, red means that is is disconnected.

data.description:
A block-style watchface for Pebble Time and Time Steel inspired by /u/schamu on the Pebble subreddit. 

Features include:
• Support for both 12 and 24 hour time
• Day, date, and month
• Current temperature (Celsius or Fahrenheit) based on either current location, custom zip code, or lat/long coordinates
• Bluetooth connection status (blue square = connected, red = disconnected)
• Battery meter (updates every 10%, fully green when charging)
• Background and font color configuration - choose from any of the 64 colors available on Pebble Time
• Hourly vibrate option (see configuration page)
• Persistent storage of settings

Included in V1.4: 
• Added sleep hours! You can now select a time frame so the watch will not vibrate hourly and the weather fetching is stopped. 
• Bug fixes for weather fetching (stay tuned for a better weather provider) 
• Graphical bug fixes (date, fonts, etc.) 
• Added option to disable battery meter

Please contact me with suggestions or with found bugs!

Future updates include:
• Expanded weather detail screen
• Animations

data.title: Block Time
